title: Las Estrellas
subtitle: The Stars
meta_desc: Learn about stars in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, las estrellas Spanish, stars Spanish kids

pages.title: Las Estrellas
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, a magical night sky full of bright twinkling stars over a meadow.

pages.title: Las estrellas brillan.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, thousands of sparkling stars twinkling in a deep blue sky.

pages.title: Las estrellas son muchas.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, a vast sky filled with countless stars, milky way visible, child looking up.

pages.title: Una estrella fugaz.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, a bright shooting star streaking across a night sky over a hill.

pages.title: Las estrellas hacen formas.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, constellations connected by glowing lines in the sky, a bear shape visible.

pages.title: Yo cuento estrellas.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, a child lying on grass pointing at stars and counting them.
